import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Flex } from 'fannypack';

# Flex

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: flex`.

## import

```js
import { Flex } from 'fannypack';
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Flex>This is a flex</Flex>
```

## Theming

<Theme component={Flex} overrides={['Flex.css.root']}>This is a flex</Theme>
